title: 2020 Singapore Covid-19 Continuous Updating
content: As of 18 Jan 2021, 12pm, MOH has preliminarily confirmed 2 new cases of locally transmitted COVID-19 infection. Based on investigations so far, the cases are in the community, and there are no new cases in the dormitories. There are 12 imported cases who had already been placed on Stay-Home Notice or isolated upon arrival in Singapore. In total, there are 14 new cases of COVID-19 infection in Singapore today. MOH will share further updates in its press release that will be issued later tonight.
